permissions: No authorization required; ShiftCounterPolicy#create returns true and ShiftCountersController skips auth enforcement.
side_effects: Runs a count query of accepted, not-cancelled tender job schedule shifts starting after start_at_min; does not persist shift counters.
validation_notes: If provided, start-at-min must be a valid datetime; invalid dates raise validation errors. When omitted, start_at_min defaults to 2017-01-01 00:00 in the app default time zone.
